issue.title: [Gandiva] Define logical query plans in protobuf
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4163](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4163). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like the ability to define logical query plans in the Gandiva proto definition.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4163?focusedCommentId=16734971) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
As per discussion on mailing list, this doesn't make sense for Gandiva.
